title: Die Frau des Fris√∂rs
overview: Vera and Siegfried have taken out a large loan and mortgaged their house and livelihood so that Vera can realize her lifelong dream of becoming a fashion designer. Unfortunately, her dream is shattered. Vera wonders how she's going to teach the down-to-earth Siegfried, who runs a hairdressing salon in Prignitz. But then everything changes...
